title: Calories in Oikos Triple Zero Yogurt
meta_description: Discover calories in Oikos Triple Zero, a nonfat Greek yogurt with 100 kcal per serving, plus protein, carbs, fat details, and variations for your diet.
h1: Calories in Oikos Triple Zero Yogurt
assumptions: Per 5.3 oz (150 g) container of Oikos Triple Zero nonfat Greek yogurt, blended flavor (e.g., vanilla); no added toppings; values based on official label.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and exact serving size. Check product packaging for the most accurate info.

quick_answer.text: One 5.3 oz serving of Oikos Triple Zero provides 100 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Oikos Triple Zero serving?
What's the protein in Oikos Triple Zero?
faqs.a: 15 g of high-quality protein per serving.

faqs.q: Does Oikos Triple Zero have sugar or fat?
faqs.a: 5 g natural sugars, 0 g added sugar, and 0 g fat.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Oikos Triple Zero?
faqs.a: 7 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber, for a low net carb option.

faqs.q: How does Oikos Triple Zero compare to regular yogurt?
faqs.a: Lower calories and sugar, higher protein than many regular yogurts.
